title: [process-review] Add post-tool hooks for automatic beads export
description:
See .agents/reviews/review-2026-01-09.md for full details.

Primary action: Configure post-tool hooks in .claude/settings.json to automatically export beads database after bead operations.

Why critical:
- Project has closed 3 Discovery beads with manual export (no automation)
- Database is 188KB and will grow during Build phase
- All sibling businesses (6, 7, 8) have same gap - systematic need
- Prevents data loss and ensures git-backed beads database

Implementation:
1. Add TodoWritePostTool hook to trigger on bead closures
2. Add BashPostTool hook for git sync automation
3. Follow pattern from Claude Code hooks documentation
4. Test with bead closure to verify automation works

This bead should be worked next as it improves development process and prevents data loss before Build phase starts.
